title: India pins hopes on desi boys Maruti & Tata as big dole out to Merc & Tesla stutters
description: The Indian government is scaling back its EV policy aimed at attracting international giants like Tesla, VinFast, Mercedes, and BMW due to a lackluster response. Local carmakers such as Maruti Suzuki and Toyota have also influenced this decision by lobbying for similar benefits for hybrid vehicles.
